description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+32 vs. AC

Hit: 2d8 + 9 damage, and ongoing 15 damage (save ends).

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Melee 4 (one creature)

+30 vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d10 + 15 damage, and either slide the target 3 squares or knock the target prone. If the Bramble Queen is bloodied, the target takes the damage and is instead slid 3 squares and also knocked prone.

At-Will

Standard

Effect: The Bramble Queen makes up to three claws of bark and/or writhing briar attacks, in any combination.

Recharge when first bloodied

Standard

Attack: Close burst 4 (creatures in the burst)

+30 vs. Reflex

Hit: 4d10 + 10 damage, and the target is pushed 3 squares and knocked prone.

Miss: Half damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares.

Recharge 4-6

Move

Effect: The Bramble Queen shifts up to 8 squares, and can ignore difficult terrain and move through creatures during this shift. At any one point during the shift, the Bramble Queen can make a claws of bark or writhing briar attack.

At-Will ✦ illusion

Minor

Effect: The Bramble Queen can disguise herself to appear as any Medium humanoid, usually a beautiful elf or eladrin. A successful Insight check (opposed by the Bramble Queen's Bluff check) pierces the disguise.

Recharge 6 ✦ polymorph

Minor

Effect: The Bramble Queen trades bodies with a plant ally within 10 squares. The queen and the ally swap positions, and also trade conditions or other ongoing effects.

At-Will

Triggered

Trigger: An enemy within 4 squares leaves a square or makes a ranged or area attack.

Effect (Immediate Interrupt): The Bramble Queen makes a writhing briar attack against the triggering enemy.

At-Will

Triggered

Trigger: An ally begins its turn within 4 squares of the Bramble Queen.

Effect (Free Action): The Bramble Queen slides the ally 3 squares.

system.biography:
HP 896; Bloodied 448
Resist 25 poison 		Init +28 | AP 2 | Save +5 (+10 against charm effects)
AC 41Fort 39Ref 39Will 40
Speed 6 (forest walk), climb 6
Ability ScoresStr 18 (+17)
Con 26 (+21)		Dex 27 (+21)
Int 21 (+18)		Wis 23 (+19)
Cha 30 (+23)
Languages Common, Elven, Selephra can speak with any plant or mundane animal
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +23, Bluff +28, Diplomacy +28, Insight +24, Intimidate +28, Nature +24Senses Low-light vision , tremorsense 10
Passive Perception 29 | Insight 34
